caption:
Are you considering a move abroad? Or perhaps traveling long term? Have you ever considered what it takes to safely and legally transition from your home country to a new country? 

Moving overseas is a dream many people share. However, it’s not just about packing your bags and buying a plane ticket. 

This week on the @transformwithtravel Podcast, I’m joined by Lauren Klein, an esteemed estate planning attorney, to discuss the implications of moving abroad. Lauren deeply understand the legal complexities of relocating internationally and shares invaluable insights from her experience.

We talk about:
- Election Impact on Moving Abroad
- Legal Considerations for Moving Overseas
- Estate Planning Essentials
- Tax Implications of Living Abroad
- Managing U.S. Assets While Overseas
- Building Your Support Team
- Digital Vault for Estate Planning

Listen to the full episode on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, YouTube and any other podcast app! 

Thanks to our guest @lawyerlaurenklein of @flourishlawgroup 

And thanks to our partner @roamright Travel Insurance!
